entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
